mapper.update: update tb_ems_msg set name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},msg=#{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},tid=#{tid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, uid=#{uid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update tb_ems_msg set status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select t1.name,t1.id,t1.uuid,t1.msg,t1.tuuid,t2.name tname,t1.uid,t3.user uname,t1.createTime,t1.status from tb_ems_msg t1,tb_ems_template t2,tb_login_user t3 where t1.tid=t2.id and t1.uid=t3.uuid
SELECT last_insert_id() as id FROM tb_ems_msg topic limit 1
